metadata.Title: CVE-2021-25631 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: In the LibreOffice 7-1 series in versions prior to 7.1.2, and in the 7-0 series in versions prior to 7.0.5, the denylist can be circumvented by manipulating the link so it doesn't match the denylist but results in ShellExecute attempting to launch an executable type.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> This is a windows-specific CVE

criterions.comment: libreoffice: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
